did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Methodist Episcopal Church of Avoca records, 1834-1894.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Methodist Episcopal Church of Avoca (Avoca, N.Y.)

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Two volumes of quarterly conference meeting minutes for the Avoca charge (1860-1894) and the Avoca circuit (1853-1862) respectively, a membership record book (1865-1891) and a subscription book (1834-1835).

bioghist.head: ORGANIZATIONAL HISTORY
bioghist.p: According to the historical record in volume three of this collection, the first Methodist class in Avoca was formed in 1823. At that time it was part of the Newtown circuit, East Genesee Conference. The church's meeting house was built in 1834 and a parsonage was built about 1842.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Two volumes of quarterly conference meeting minutes for the Avoca charge (1860-1894) and the Avoca circuit (1853-1862) respectively, a membership record book (1865-1891) and a subscription book (1834-1835).
